data.actual_result: It's like hitting the bottom, (check attachments)
data.short_description: A few drop-down menus are not centered anymore
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to generate invite links - Click the cog wheel (⚙) and look at where it says "1 day" or "No limit" - OR - Go to server settings and look at "AFK-CHANNEL" or "NEW MEMBERS MESSAGES CHANNEL"
